ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents users from using the woonstad email address for stadswonen cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( ParentId )), FromAddress != $User.Email, ISPICKVAL( Parent.Label__c , 'stadswonen'), NOT(CONTAINS( FromAddress , 'stadswonen')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You want to send an email from @woonstadrotterdam.nl, but the case has the label 'Stadswonen'. Please select an @stadswonenrotterdam.nl email address.
